## **Tender Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a provider to deliver French as a second language (FSL) and English as second language (ESL) training to the Ontario Region (O Division) using a virtual platform with MS Teams. Training delivery must cover the following levels of learning:

*   Beginner 1
*   Beginner 2
*   Intermediate 1
*   Intermediate 2
*   Advanced

The Standing Offer is expected to begin on September 1, 2024, and run for one (1) year with two (2) one-year renewal options.
